Articles.Content:
I have a brand new MBP 64 bit macOS High Sierra (10.13). 2.3 ghz I5, 8 GB RAM, Intel Iris plus graphics 640.

KSP Version: 

New KSP download from Steam, no old versions on computer (completely new computer with no file transfer from old). All Stock.

[config]
build id = 01804
2017-05-25_18-10-27
Branch: master
language = en-us

What Happens: Flickering/stuttering immediately after squad loading screen. It makes the game unplayable, either full screen or not. If not full screen, everything else stutters and flickers. Game hangs badly when trying to launch a ship, though eventually catches up. Entire MacBook screen stutters (not just KSP) while playing KSP. See screenshots. I turned all graphic settings down/up/etc. 

Mods / Add-Ons: All Stock

Picture of the issue, which is hard to show through screenshots.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/c6u1q07ksm1aqoq/Screen Shot 2017-09-26 at 7.00.20 PM.png?dl=0

Picture of my computer specs.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/hqo6nddtqum9gly/MacBook Pro Specs.spx?dl=0

Picture of the last graphics settings I tried.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/leywmj5j8hp1jj2/Screen Shot 2017-09-26 at 7.07.36 PM.png?dl=0

 

I hope that is enough information, please let me know if I need to post anything else. Needless to say I am quite disappointed. My prior Mac running Sierra (2011 MBP 2.0 ghz quad core, 4 gb RAM) ran KSP flawlessly. This MBP is going back to apple if it is a computer issue.

Hey, you're not the first who has problems with the new Mac OS. 
Somehow Sierra doesn't operate KSP quitte well. The best you can do is to upload your logs and report the bug to the devs here. 
Don't expect this will be fixed a la minute, but I'm sure the devs will have some patch for it soon. Or maybe Mac OS will patch it out. 

If you ask me, it's quitte certain a problem with the new Sierra, hope this gives some relief.  

 

 

 

Edited September 28, 2017 by DrLicor

Jeez. My mistake. I thought I looked through here some, but I didn't use the search bar to best effect. My apologies. 

 

Thank you for taking the time to respond.
